name: get_news_from_a_specific_source
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool pollution_news_api.
Tool description: An API service returning news articles about pollution in african countries.
Try using another project of mine to summarize the articles - 
https://soft-summarizer.vercel.app/ 
API description: This Endpoint would return news on pollution in african countries from a specific news source

newspaperid.description: The identifier of the news source to fetch pollution news from.
